publ: by 深圳市维玺科技有限公司
name: Mubview
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mubview skill can only work with certain AC-powered Wi-Fi cameras. Not all cameras using Mubview APP can use Mubview skill. Please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Mubview App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Mubview App, and keep it online and running.
2. Find Mubview Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the front door" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
If any problem occurs during the process, don't hesitate to contact Seller Technical Support.
